subject: Football (College)
College Athletics
Football
lead_paragraph: Mark Emmert, the N.C.A.A. president, told the Justice Department on Wednesday that its questions about the lack of a college football playoff system were best directed to the Bowl Championship Series.
snippet: Mark Emmert, the N.C.A.A. president, told the Justice Department on Wednesday that its questions about the lack of a college football playoff system were best directed to the Bowl Championship Series.
